mapper.select: SELECT item_tag.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM item_tag WHERE itemid IN ( SELECT itemid FROM interface JOIN items ON interface.hostid = items.hostid WHERE interface.ip = #{ip}) AND `value` = 'ifbasic' GROUP BY itemid ) items JOIN item_tag ON item_tag.itemid = items.itemid where item_tag.tag = 'ifindex' and item_tag.itemid NOT IN( SELECT DISTINCT(itemid) FROM item_tag WHERE item_tag.`value` IN('{#IFMASK}', '{#IFNAME}', '{#IFMAC}', '{#IFINDEX}', '{#IPADDR}','{#IPARP}', '{#IFOPERSTATUS}', '{#IFALIAS}', '{#IFRECEIVED}', '{#IFSPEED}', '{#RTIF}', '{#RTPROTO}','{#RTDEST}', '{#RTMETRIC}','{#RTNH}', '{#PORTINDEX}', '{#MAC}', '{#IFIPADDR}', '{#IFSENT}') ) order by itemid asc limit 1

SELECT * FROM item_tag tag_inner WHERE itemid in ( SELECT item_tag.itemid FROM ( SELECT * FROM item_tag WHERE itemid IN ( SELECT itemid FROM interface JOIN items ON interface.hostid = items.hostid WHERE interface.ip = #{ip}) AND `value` = 'ifbasic' GROUP BY itemid ORDER BY itemid DESC ) items JOIN item_tag ON item_tag.itemid = items.itemid WHERE item_tag.`value` = #{ifindex} AND item_tag.tag = 'ifindex' ) AND tag_inner.tag = 'ifname'

select item_tag1.*, item_tag.value boardType from( select item.* from( SELECT item_external.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM item_tag WHERE itemid IN ( SELECT itemid FROM interface JOIN items ON interface.hostid = items.hostid WHERE interface.ip = #{ip} AND available = 1) AND `value` in(#{cpu}, #{mem}, #{temp}) GROUP BY itemid ORDER BY itemid DESC ) items JOIN item_tag item_external ON item_external.itemid = items.itemid
)item join ( SELECT item_external.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM item_tag WHERE itemid IN ( SELECT itemid FROM interface JOIN items ON interface.hostid = items.hostid WHERE interface.ip = #{ip} AND available = 1) AND `value` in(#{cpu}, #{mem}, #{temp}) GROUP BY itemid ORDER BY itemid DESC ) items JOIN item_tag item_external ON item_external.itemid = items.itemid WHERE item_external.tag = 'boardmodel' GROUP BY `value` )item2 ON item.value = item2.value ) item_tag1 JOIN item_tag ON item_tag.itemid = item_tag1.itemid WHERE item_tag.tag = 'obj' AND item_tag.itemid NOT IN( SELECT DISTINCT(itemid) FROM item_tag WHERE item_tag.`value` IN('{#BOARD}') )

SELECT * FROM item_tag WHERE itemid IN ( SELECT itemid FROM interface JOIN items ON interface.hostid = items.hostid WHERE interface.ip = #{ip} AND available = 1 ) AND `value` in('BOARDCPU', 'BOARDMEM', 'BOARDTEMP') GROUP BY itemid ORDER BY itemid DESC
